document_data.name: ''Moonfall's Shroud''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moonfall's shroud''''' was an enchanted hood worn by [[cleric]]s from [[Waterdeep]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: These shrouds were of gentle blue color with [[silver]] trim. The front of ''moonfall's shroud'' was decorated with an image of silver crescent.
document_data.Powers: ''Moonfall's shroud'' purpose was enhancing the wearer's ''healing'' magic. When a cleric who wore this shroud used ''healing'' spells on another person, it also extended the effects of healing onto the wearer.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Halbenet Soladonel]]: a [[moon elf]] [[cleric]] of [[Corellon Larethian]] who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
